featured.text: The rule of thumb, however, is to see a doctor first and get an accurate diagnosis.

definition.zh_def: 拇指，手或腳的第一根指頭，通常比其他指頭粗壯且短。
definition.en_def: The short, thick first digit of the human hand, opposable to the other fingers.
definition.example: She gave a thumbs up to show her approval.
